column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh – Phnom Penh authorities have temporarily suspended traffic on the steel Russei Keo bridge due to an oil tanker crashed yesterday.------Sam Piseth
column4: director of the Phnom Penh Municipal Department of Public Works and Transport
column5: told the press that on the morning of September 11
column7: authorities had temporarily suspended the traffic on the Russey Keo bridge due to an oil tanker crash last night.------He added that experts and authorities are now inspecting the site to find out the damage and the impact. Upon final review
column8: the authorities will issue a formal notification informing the public.------The company added that Savannak’s oil tanker had crashed into the eastern end of the bridge. ------SWIFT NEWS
